ygData.subject: > Subject: Re: Psalm of cooling query
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The total non-melee damage shown will reflect all the shields in effect even though only one flavor message is shown. Also, setting /serverfilter off will
ygData.messageBody:
> Subject: Re: Psalm of cooling query
>
> The Damage Shield message will only display the most damaging shield. (IE:
> Pierced by Thorns.)
>
> Your Chilled to the bone should not appear unless Thorns falls off.


The total non-melee damage shown will reflect all the shields in effect even
though only one flavor message is shown.

Also, setting /serverfilter off will block all the messaged no matter how you
have your client-side chat filter set.

Maravana Vireo
58 Bard of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
